ygData.subject: re: Gnome Gnecromancer - where can I bank?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, let s see... Yes, you are KOS to all the other guards on Faydwer, other than gnomes. That includes the Felwithe (actually, I don t think I ve ever been to
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, let's see...
Yes, you are KOS to all the other guards on Faydwer, other than gnomes. That includes the
Felwithe (actually, I don't think I've ever been to the wood elves with my gnome necro, but
I'm sure they are KOS too...) and the dwarves. Across the water, things are a bit better. You
are fine wandering around Freeport, Qeynos and Neriak. Oggok and Grobb are off limits.
The guards in both places will mop the floor with you on sight. Rivervale is also not an option.
You are also KOS in Highpass Hold, BTW. Gather Shadows isn't must before travelling to
Freeport, but you must sneak around the guards at the docks by going around the wall and
swimming into the dock area. There used to be a dwarf guard swimming around in there, but
haven't seen him lately. Luck.

Arkham, gnome necromancer (Bertoxxulous server)


> ** Original Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Gnome Gnecromancer - where can I bank?
> ** Original Sender: Mark Rafn <dagon@...>
> ** Original Date: Mon, 25 Oct 1999 16:56:17 -0700 (PDT)

> ** Original Message follows...

>
> From: Mark Rafn <dagon@...>
>
> Just started a Necromancer, now L4. Will likely hit L8 this week and be
> ready (with Gather Shadows) to travel a bit if I don't choose to wander
> sooner, and perhaps hook up with some Troll friends.
>
> So - What cities am I likely to be tolerated well enough to be able to get
> to the bank and vendors?
>
> I know Ak'Anon is fine. Nobody outside the Mines of Malfunction likes me,
> but neither do they hate me. I've been told that it's instant death to
> get anywhere near the dwarf guards in Butcherblock, so Kaladim is out. I
> presume Kelethin and Felwithe are likewise verboten - can anyone confirm?
>
> On Antonica, I know I can get out of the docks in the tunnel that has the
> Necro guild, and presumably sell there as well. Can I get to the bank in
> N Freeport? Innothule is likely my first destination - can I go into
> Grobb or Oggok to get bound or is E Freeport the closest place? Will the
> DE vendors in S Ro or any of the vendors in Innothule, Feerott, or Rathe
> Mountains talk to me? How about the rest of the continent? Can I walk
> into Neriak?
>
> Your thoughts, please. I tried searching the archives with no luck; If
> this is a FAQ, please feel free to reply directly instead of to the list,
> or just point to a site with the information. I've looked at all the
> sites linked from http://everquest.gamestats.com/Classes.htm but didn't
> see any specific data listed.
>
> Thanks much!
> --
> Mark Rafn dagon@... <http://www.dagon.net/> !G
